Two-factor authentication (2FA):\nThis adds an extra layer of security by requiring a factor, such as a code sent to your phone, in addition to your password to log in.
Password strength requirements:\nThis ensures your password is difficult to guess by enforcing minimum length and complexity rules.
Data encryption:\nThis protects your sensitive information,such as account numbers and social security numbers,from being accessed by unauthorized users.
Secure session management:\nThis ensures your session is automatically terminated after a period of inactivity or if you log out.
